lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Ryan Karazija
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Low Roar
[00:08.963]
[00:09.937]sometimes it feels
[00:21.942]like this is never ending
[00:34.061]sometimes you feel
[00:45.381]like you’ll always wake up
[00:57.466]and nothing will change
[01:02.396]
[01:04.730]fall in routine
[01:16.405]accept who we are
[01:28.300]forget to say goodbyes
[01:39.735]like you’ll say it again
[01:46.135]
[01:51.715]like nothing will change
[01:59.137]nothing will change
[02:03.625]
[02:53.414]sometimes it feels
[03:05.081]like this is never ending
[03:16.737]but we all fade away
[03:20.810]
